price: Allah berfirman, "Maka sesungguhnya Kami telah menguji kaummu sesudah kamu tinggalkan dan mereka telah disesatkan oleh As-Sāmirī 938.
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ
footnotes: 938.  As-Sāmirī  adalah seorang dari Bani Isrā`īl dari suku Assamirah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
